summary: treatment with EPs 7630 reduces the administration of paracetamol in children with acute tonsillopharyngitis (ATP) or acute bronchitis (AB) compared to placebo, EPs 7630 reduced the cumulative dose of paracetamol in 5 out of the 6 trials. children aged 6–10 with AB or ATP, EPs 7630 alleviated symptom burden. concomitant use of paracetamol was reduced.
